archimate:Device.name: Wall Mounted Barcode Scanner (WMBS)
archimate:Device.documentation:
(For Patient Self Check-In, Registration Desks, and Kiosks)
Intended Use:
• Departments: Outpatient clinics, admissions area, diagnostic imaging, pharmacy, emergency triage • Purpose: Hands-free scanning of QR codes from smartphones or printed documents at check-in stations, kiosks, or entrances
Scanning Capabilities:
• Scanner Type: Fixed-mount 2D imaging scanner
• Symbology Support: 2D Codes: QR Code, DataMatrix, PDF417, Aztec 1D Codes: Code 128, Code 39, EAN-13, UPC, etc.
• Scan Angle: Wide-angle lens (minimum horizontal 40°, vertical 30°)
• Scanning Distance: Optimal range 4–10 inches (10–25 cm) Supports screen scanning (smartphones/tablets) and paper scanning
• Motion Tolerance: Reads moving QR codes (minimum 5–10 inches/sec), suitable for fast interactions
• Image Sensor Resolution: Minimum 640 × 480 pixels (VGA) or higher
Mounting & Enclosure:
• Mounting Type: Wall-mounted or flush-mounted into kiosk housing Tilt-adjustable bracket or fixed-angle enclosure • Housing Material: ABS or polycarbonate, tamper-resistant Antimicrobial, wipe-clean surface for infection control IP52 or higher for dust/splash resistance • Lighting & Feedback: Built-in targeting LED, scan confirmation beep and LED indicator Configurable light ring or chime for user feedback
Connectivity Options:
• Interface Options: USB-HID (keyboard emulation) USB Virtual COM, RS-232 (for legacy systems) Ethernet interface for networked kiosks • Power: Powered via USB or external 5V–12V DC (depending on interface) or All-day 18hr battery + charging dock sanitizer Power draw typically <2.5W
Operating System Compatibility:
• Plug-and-play with: Windows 10/11 Android tablets/kiosks Thin clients with USB ports • Driver Support: No driver required (USB-HID) SDK available for custom integration if needed
Environmental & Usage Specs: • Operating Temperature: 0°C to 40°C • Humidity: 10–90% non-condensing • Drop Resistance: Survives accidental knocks (tested to 3 ft/1 m) • EMI/EMC Compliance: CE, FCC, RoHS
Additional Features:
• Adjustable scan zone for kiosk integration • Triggerless (auto-scan) mode for hands-free use • Tamper-proof housing with rear-access lock • Privacy shielding for directional scanning (prevents misreads from nearby phones)
